sentences.sContent: She is married with four children.
They arrived just after four (= four o’clock ) .
sentences.sCn: 刚过四点钟，他们就到了。

sentences.sContent: Luke will soon be four (= four years old ) .
...So it may seem rather strange that I have returned to college to finish the degree I left undone some four decades ago...
...My golden birthday would’ve been four years ago...
...it takes four to five years after economic recovery for unemployment to return to pre-crisis levels...
...They say it is healthier than green tea and could be sold for a price that is three to four times higher than the price of green tea...
...sometimes three or four hours a day...
...and there are over four times as many farmers' markets in the U...
...considering that the Kindle has only been around for four years...
...of the four generations Pew Research has data for...
...For each of them there are four choices marked A...
...They don't have time to read a chapter three or four times...

phrases.pCn: 四个现代化（农，工，国防，科技）；四化
四大银行；大四星；四大会计师事务所
完全一致；四脚着地地；匍匐

words.tran: 第四的，第四个的；四分之一的
第四，月的第四日；四分之一
四人的一组；四人对抗赛
第十四；月的第十四日；十四分之一
